availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Singleton P. Walters (Madison County, Kentucky, merchant and banker)

body.p: Madison County, Kentucky, merchant and banker. Madison County, Kentucky, native. Married to Minerva Kikendall Walters in Madison County, Kentucky, on September 15, 1846. Father of Harriett Walters and Henry B. Walters. Married to Ann W. Anderson Walters in Madison County on January 29, 1852. Merchant in Madison County in 1850. Banker in Madison County in 1860. Owned three enslaved persons in Madison County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, District 3, p. 320B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, Richmond, p. 142-43.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, Richmond, p. 474B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Madison County Marriages, Film #000183302, p. 15.
Kentucky Marriage Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994047, Madison County Marriages, p. 1.
"Singleton P. Walters (1816-1885)," Find A Grave, Memorial #133114980, accessed December 28, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/133114980.
